scripts.copy-configuration-demo: cp codecept.conf-demo.js codecept.conf.js && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.copy-configuration-dev: cp codecept.conf-dev.js codecept.conf.js && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.acceptance-tests: npm run copy-configuration-dev && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.acceptance-tests-demo: npm run copy-configuration-demo && npx codeceptjs run --steps
scripts.acceptance-tests-prod: npm run copy-configuration-prod && npx codeceptjs run --steps
